original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND c.Score=0 AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 19:56:21' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 13:36:12' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views<=433 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 21:37:39' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0 AND (CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 19:56:21' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 13:36:12')
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2.UserId=E3.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 433 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 21:37:39'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2E3.UserId=E4.Id)
